messages.content: create complete links indicating the reference site, from the following text:  {{20.`1`}}
escolha aleatoriamente um link dos disponíveis no resultado: {{19.choices[].message.content}}. Responda só o link. sem conversa. não coloque aspas.

content.text: Crie um prompt para uma imagem realista de: {{17.data}}

spec.help: You can send image content blocks starting with Claude 3 models.

spec.label: Type

spec.help: File name, including the extension, for example, `image.jpg`.
spec.name: filename
spec.label: Filename

spec.help: Binary data of the image. For example, you can retrieve the binary data of your image using the **HTTP: Get a file** module.
spec.name: data
spec.label: Data

nested.help: If the request ends with an assistant turn, then the response content will continue directly from that last turn.

values.1:
Considering the following text, please provide me with more current information (if possible from the current day) that complements the subject. Here is the text:
